name: reward_participant
attributes: # [doc = " イベント参加者にリワードトークンを配布します。"]
# [doc = " reward_manager は AccountInfo のまま受け取っており、署名チェックがありません。"]
body: let cpi_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . reward_pool . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . participant_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . reward_manager . clone () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts ,) ;
msg ! ("Rewarded {} tokens to {}" , reward_amount , ctx . accounts . participant . key ()) ;

fields.name: reward_pool
fields.attribute: # [doc = " プログラム所有のリワードプール"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: participant_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " イベント参加者のトークンアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: reward_manager
fields.attribute: # [doc = " リワード管理者（署名チェックが行われない脆弱ポイント）"]

fields.name: participant
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 実際にトークンを受け取る参加者"] # [account (signer)]
